CHANGEME: This is a whitelabel application. Delete this line, then edit the metadata below to your liking before uploading to the ChRIS Store.
title: Rclone Copy
description: Copy files to or from servers.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.help: Input path filter. Paths which do not match this regex are excluded.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.help: Regular expression to match paths. See https://docs.rs/regex/1.5.5/regex/#syntax

parameters.name: replacement
parameters.help: Replacement string with capture groups. See https://docs.rs/regex/1.5.5/regex/#grouping-and-flags
